class ListNode:

    def __init__(self, x):
        self.val = x
        self.next = None

def sortedListAdditionalOperations(head):
    if head is None and head.next is None:
        return head
    new_head = ListNode(0)
    new_head.next = head
    curr = head
    while curr is not None and curr.next is not None:
        if curr.val <= curr.next.val:
            curr = curr.next
        else:
            nxt = curr.next
            prev = new_head
            while prev.next.val < nxt.val:
                prev = prev.next
            curr.next = nxt.next
            nxt.next = prev.next
            prev.next = nxt
    prev = None
    curr = new_head.next
    while curr is not None:
        nxt = curr.next
        curr.next = prev
        prev = curr
        curr = nxt
    head = prev
    slow = head
    fast = head
    while fast and fast.next:
        slow = slow.next
        fast = fast.next.next
    return slow
